page.title: 08A Sparkwell boy in France.
page.content:
One day I was asked if I would like to go to France so I said "Yes". I got up at six o' clock in the morning because the boat left at ten o'clock. It took four hours to cross by boat. When I got there someone from the French family was waiting for me so I got of the boat and went to see them. I found out that they were nice. They brought me some games to play and some sweets to eat. So we got in the car and started heading back to where they lived. I fell asleep some of the way. So when I woke up we were there. I found out it was a farm. By the time I got there it was bed time.
Leighton Randall
